item.title: Fisher's Principle - wikipedia
item.description: #internetContent #biology Article link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisher's_principle Fisher’s principle is an evolutionary model that explains why the sex ratio of most species that produce offspring through sexual reproduction is approximately 1:1 between males and females.
